src:
私下態度差又愛開罵？　蘿莉塔被封「女版趙正平」
06 Nov 2019, 10:29 by 張詠淇
從《大學生了沒》出道，講話直率、個性大喇喇，被憲哥稱為「幹譙妞」的蘿莉塔，昨（5日）上中天《小明星大跟班》表示，「製作單位最愛大奶妹，『照奶排名』打不贏峮峮（本名吳函峮），但至少有第3名」，讓梁赫群說：「蘿莉塔講話無所畏懼，髒話常脫口而出，就連憲哥都敢直接幹譙，觀眾特愛這種爆點！」更表示「可以走趙哥（趙正平）路線，罵出一片天」。
製作人楊大衛也給予肯定「蘿莉塔有腦袋、肚子有墨水，很適合棚內綜藝談話性節目」，但透露「工作人員表示蘿莉塔對稿、錄影時態度差，甚至責罵過對方」。蘿莉塔則反駁：「不可能！一點印象都沒有！」憲哥則提醒蘿莉塔「言者無意，聽者有心，妳口無遮攔、大喇喇的個性容易招惹誤會」。


張文綺自曝最近愛上種花種樹，與王中平特別有話聊！」Sandy更爆料：「錄影前抓包張文綺與王中平通電話聊天！」（中天提供）

相較蘿莉塔的大砲個性，被認為個性無厘頭、天然呆的張文綺則說「自己沒身材、也沒資深藝人來的有效果，只能勉強排名第4」。製作人小飛卻給予張文綺高度評價：「妳雖然不漂亮，但長的『剛剛好』，擁有婆婆媽媽最愛的親切感，屬於草根親切型。」逗得現場笑倒一片，而張文綺也自嘲「我剛出道就是這個路線，超級『接地氣』！」憲哥開玩笑道「提高網路聲量就要與『王中平』交往，爆出緋聞一定有聲量！」沒想到張文綺竟自曝：「最近愛上種花種樹，與王中平特別有話聊！」Sandy更爆料「錄影前抓包張文綺與王中平通電話聊天！」
更新時間｜2019.11.06 10:27
text:
Poor attitude and love to open up? Lolita was sealed "female version Zhao Zhengping"
06 Nov 2019, 10:29 by Zhang Yiqi
Debuting from "The College Student Has Not Been", the speech is straightforward and the personality is big, and Lolita, who is called "dry girl" by the constitutional brother, said yesterday (5th) that Zhongtian "Little Star Big Follower" said, "The production unit I love the big tits, "I don't win the title according to the milk ranking" (the real name is Wu Hanjun), but at least the third place," said Liang Hequn: "Lolita speaks fearlessly, and swearing often blurts out, even the constitutional brothers Dare to do it directly, the audience loves this explosion!" It also said that "you can take the Zhao Ge (Zhao Zhengping) route and take a day."
The producer, Dr. Yang, also affirmed that "Lolita has a head and ink on her stomach, which is very suitable for a variety of talk shows in the shed", but revealed that "the staff said that Lolita had a bad attitude towards the manuscript and video recording, and even scolded the other party." Lolita retorted: "Impossible! There is no impression at all!" Xian Ge reminded Lolita that "the speaker is not interested, the listener has the heart, the mouth is unobstructed, and the personality of the Da La La is easy to cause misunderstanding."


Zhang Wenzhao has recently fallen in love with planting flowers and trees, and has a special conversation with Wang Zhongping! Sandy broke the news: "Catch Wen Zhang and Wang Zhongping to chat on the phone before the video!" (Provided by Zhongtian)

Compared with Lolita's cannon personality, Zhang Wenzhao, who is considered to be a nonsense personality and naturally stays, said that "I have no body, no senior artist, and I can only barely rank fourth." The producer Xiaofei gave Zhang Wenzhao a high evaluation: "While it is not beautiful, but the long "just good", has the intimacy of the mother-in-law's favorite, is a kind of grassroots kind." I laughed at the scene, and Zhang Wenxi also laughed at me. Just debut is this route, super "grounding gas"!" Xian Ge joked that "improving the network sound volume will be related to "Wang Zhongping", there will be a voice in the anecdote!" I did not expect Zhang Wenzhao to expose himself: "Recently fell in love Flowers and trees, and Wang Zhongping have a special conversation!" Sandy broke the news. "Before the video capture, Zhang Wenzhao and Wang Zhongping talked over the phone!"
Update time|2019.11.06 10:27
